Ontological Engineering 
©Asunción Gómez-Pérez,
Ontology Specification. Validate CQs
Objective: To identify possible conflicts between CQs, 
missing CQs, contradictions in CQs. 
Criteria: 
 Correctness.
 Completeness.
 Consistent.
 Verificable.
 Understandable.
 No Ambiguity.
 No Redundancy.
